pullRequest.title: [HUDI-1102] Add common useful Spark related and Table path detection utilities
pullRequest.bodyText:
Tips

Thank you very much for contributing to Apache Hudi.
Please review https://hudi.apache.org/contributing.html before opening a pull request.

What is the purpose of the pull request
The purpose of this PR is to separate out and land into master the Spark related and Table path detection utilities implemented as part of RFC-12 datasource changes here #1702
These utilities can be re-used for the Spark MOR datasource support work, as well as other places.
Verify this pull request

New unit tests added
It does not effect any existing code as of now

Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

nodes.bodyText: CI failed due to the stylecheck

commit.message: Add common useful Spark related and Table path detection utilities
